title: "Greek alphabet"
format: html
editor: 
  mode: source
---

For better or worse, [Greek letters](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greek_alphabet) will be flying in this class, so you should have a working knowledge of the most common ones used in mathematics:

::: {.center-table}
| Greek Letter       | English Name |
|--------------------|--------------|
| $A, \alpha$        | alpha        |
| $B, \beta$         | beta         |
| $\Gamma, \gamma$   | gamma        |
| $\Delta, \delta$   | delta        |
| $E, \epsilon$      | epsilon      |
| $Z, \zeta$         | zeta         |
| $H, \eta$          | eta          |
| $\Theta, \theta$   | theta        |
| $I, \iota$         | iota         |
| $K, \kappa$        | kappa        |
| $\Lambda, \lambda$ | lambda       |
| $M, \mu$           | mu ("mew")   |
| $N, \nu$           | nu           |
| $\Xi, \xi$         | xi           |
| $O, o$             | omicron      |
| $\Pi, \pi$         | pi           |
| $P, \rho$          | rho ("row")  |
| $\Sigma, \sigma$   | sigma        |
| $T, \tau$          | tau          |
| $Y, \upsilon$      | upsilon      |
| $\Phi, \phi$       | phi          |
| $X, \chi$          | chi ("kai")  |
| $\Psi, \psi$       | psi          |
| $\Omega, \omega$   | omega        |
:::
